title: How to Make Flaming Arrows in Minecraft

steps.title: Acquire your materials.
steps.content: Acquire your materials. You will need: An anvil [1] X Research source A bow Enchanted Book Flame I

steps.title: Place the anvil.
steps.content: Place the anvil. Right-click on it to open the anvil 'window', which will allow you to use the anvil.

steps.title: Place the bow in the first slot and the enchanted book in the second slot.
steps.content: Place the bow in the first slot and the enchanted book in the second slot. [2] X Research source Then drag the newly enchanted bow from the third slot into your inventory. This will cost you two XP levels.

steps.title: Spawn some animals and experiment.
steps.content: Spawn some animals and experiment. If you shoot a chicken with a flaming arrow, it gives you cooked chicken. The same will work for sheep, cows, pigs etc.

steps.title: You can use flaming arrows to light TNT.
steps.content: You can use flaming arrows to light TNT. Try making a trap with it. Hook up a dispenser to a tripwire, so that when someone walks over the tripwire, the arrow ignites the TNT. However, flaming arrows will not set fire to trees or wood.
